lead_paragraph: In the census district encompassing the Queens neighborhoods of Elmhurst and southern Corona, a quarter of all residential units are considered crowded.

headline.print_headline: When the Kitchen Is Also a Bedroom: Overcrowding Worsens in the City
headline.main: When the Kitchen Is Also a Bedroom: Overcrowding Worsens in New York

snippet: In the census district encompassing the Queens neighborhoods of Elmhurst and southern Corona, a quarter of all residential units are considered crowded.
abstract: Percentage of crowded households in New York City, defined as homes with more than one person per room, is increasing as affordable housing crisis intensifies; overcrowding, most common in working class and immigrant neighborhoods, has been linked by substantial amounts of research to accidents, physical and mental illnesses, and in many cases eventual homelessness; five of top 10 most crowded neighborhoods in New York City are in central Queens..
